General.Name: Effecten-Spiegel AG
General.Description: Effecten-Spiegel AG engages in the investment and publishing businesses in Germany and internationally. It also holds investments in other companies, as well as publishes journalist market letter segment. The company was founded in 1971 and is based in Dusseldorf, Germany.

0.Name: Ms. Marlis  Weidtmann
0.Title: CEO & Member of the Management Board
